column2: "...They can't be serious, right?! 70 enemies?! I can't even deal with 7!"
"I mean, maybe it's not such a big deal to a natural-born killer such as yourself."
"But 70?! I can't imagine taking on an order like that..."
"OK, killer. If you think you can handle it, go for it. I'll watch and study how ya do it!"
